maqras.text: hum soganda kha'um chum kayamatana divasana
ane soganda kha'um chum thapako apanara antaratmana
sum manavi ema samaje che ke ame tena hadaka bhega karisu ja nahim
kema nahim ame jarurathi karisum, ame to samartha chi'e ke tena terava sudhdha thika kari da'i'e
parantu manavi icche che ke agala agala avajna karato rahe
savala kare che ke kayamatano divasa kayare avase
basa! Je samaye najara pathara'i jase
ane candra prakasahina tha'i jase
suraja ane candra bhega kari devamam avase
te divase manavi kahese ke aje bhagava mate jgya kayam che
na na ko'i sarana nathi
aje to tara palanahara tarapha ja sarana che
aje manavine tene agala mokalela ane pachala chodelathi saceta karavamam avase
parantu manavi svayam pote puravo che
ketalaya bahana raju kema na kare
(he payagambara) tame kura'ana majida ne jaldi (yada karava) mate potani jabanane halavo nahim
tenum bhegum karavum ane (tamari jabanathi) padhavavum amara sire che
ame jyare tene padhi la'i'e to tame tena jevum ja padho
pachi ano (artha) spasta kari devo pana amara sire che
na na tame jhadapathi malavavali (duniya) thi prema karo cho
ane akhirata (paraloka) ne chodi betha cho
te divase ghana cahera tajagibharya hase
potana palanahara tarapha jo'i rahya hase
Ane ketalaka cahera te divase udasa hase
samajata hase ke temani sathe kamara todi nakhanaro vyavahara karavamam avase
na na jyare jiva gala sudhi pahonci jase
ane kahevamam avase ke ko'i mantra-tantra karanara che
ane tene jani lidhum ke a chuta padavano samaya che
ane pindi sathe pindi valagi jase
aje tara palanahara tarapha pharavanum che
tene na to sacum theravyu, na to namajha padhi
parantu juthalavyu ane anakani kari
pachi potana gharavala'o pase itara'ine gayo
kheda che tara para, aphasosa che tara para
pachi kheda che tara para ane aphasosa che tara mate
sum manavi ema samaje che ke tene ama ja nirarthaka chodi devamam avase
sum te eka jada paninum bunda nahato je tapakavavamam avyum hatum
pachi te lohino loco bani gayo, pachi allaha'e tenum sarjana karyu ane thikathaka banavi didho
pachi tenathi jodakam etale ke nara ane mada banavya
sum (allaha ta'ala) te (karya) para saktimana nathi ke mrtane jivita kari de
ni:Sanka manavi upara eka evo samaya pana vityo che jyare te ka'inja nondhapatra vastu nahato
ni:Sanka ame manavine misrita viryana tipamanthi kasoti mate paida karyo. Ane tene sambhalavavalo, jovavalo banavyo
ame tene marga batavyo, have cahe to te abhari bane athava to krtadhna
ni:Sanka ame inkari'o mate sankalo ane toka ane bhabhukati aga taiyara kari rakhi che
ni:Sanka sadacari loko te jama (sarabana pyala) pise. Jenum misrrana kapuranum che
je eka jharanum che, jemanthi allahana banda'o pise, teni sakha'o kadhi la'i jase (jyam icchase)
Je najhara (phakata allaha mate maneli manata) puri kare che. Ane te divasathi dare che jeni apatti careya baju phela'i janari che
ane allaha ta'alani mohabbatamam khavanum khavadave che, gariba, anatha ane kedi'one
ame to tamane phakata allaha ta'ala ni prasannata mate khavadavi'e chi'e. Na tamarathi badalo icchi'e che ane na to abhara
ni:Sanka ame potana palanaharathi te divasa no bhaya rakhi'e chi'e je udasa ane sakhata hase
basa! Temane allaha ta'ala'e te divasani apattithi bacavi lidha ane temane tajagi ane khusi pahoncadi
ane temane temani dhairyana badalamam jannata ane resami posaka apya
te tyam asano para takiya lagavine betha hase, na to tyam surajano tadako jose na thandini ugrata
te jannatona chaya temana para jhukela hase ane tena (phala ane) guccha nice latakela hase
ane temana para candina vasano ane te jamone (sarabana pyala) pheravavamam avase je kacana hase
kaca pana candina jene yogya pramanamam bharya hase
ane temane tyam te jama pivadavavamam avase jenum misrana jhanjabila (sutha,sunku adu) num hase
jannatani eka nahera jenum nama salasabila che
